product_name: Menasha Ridge Press Day and Overnight Hikes: Anza Borrego Desert State Park
long_description: Combining a detailed narrative with GPS-based trail maps, this book breaks down the best-of-the-best hikes in Anza Borrego State Park. Author: Sheri McGregor. Softcover; 190 pages; black-and-white photos; maps; illustrations. Menasha Ridge Press; copyright 2007. Each of the 32 trail profiles offers commentary on what to expect along the way. Each hike is rated for scenery, difficulty, trail condition, solitude and accessibility for children. Elevation profiles and clear directions help make this a user-friendly guide. Recommendations guide hikers to the most scenic hikes, best hikes for solitude, wildflowers, wildlife and more.
short_description: Combining a detailed narrative with GPS-based trail maps, this book breaks down the best-of-the-best hikes in Anza Borrego State Park.
